echo.message: javadocs --> generates the API docs (needs Java 1.2 or higher)
samples --> compiles the samples source code
tests --> compiles the tests source code
deprecatedjars --> generates xerces.jar and samples jar
dtdjars --> generates xercesImpl containing no schema support or WML/HTML DOM and xercesSamples & xml-apis jars
dvjar --> generates a Schema datatype jar
pack-tools --> generates the tools distributions (zip and tar.gz)
pack-src --> generates the source distributions (zip and tar.gz)
deprecated-bin --> generates the binary distributions (zip and tar.gz)
pack-bin --> generates the binary distributions (zip and tar.gz)
all --> generates the binary, source and tools distributions
deprecatedall --> generates the binary, source and tools distributions with the xerces.jar
test --> runs a sanity test on the sample files
clean --> cleans up all generated files and directories
usage --> provides help on using the build tool (default)
See comments inside the build.xml file for more details.
